characters.name: Aang
characters.description: The first show to have a life bending impact on me. Zenned out at 20 when I met Aang

characters.name: Naruto Uzumaki
characters.description: A determined ninja with a dream to become the leader of his village.

characters.name: Kakashi Hatake
characters.description: Only the coolest ninja to ever exist.

characters.name: Levi
characters.description: A genius and loyal soldier extremely well adept at aerial attack.

characters.name: Rengoku Sama
characters.description: Set your heart ablaze. Enough said

characters.name: Anya Forger
characters.description: Mischievous psychic with a strange love for spy shows

characters.name: Vegeta
characters.description: The most handsome villian and no points for guessing also a childhood crush

characters.name: Sakura
characters.description: Probably the first anime I ever saw(w/o knowing what anime meant) of this young magician girl who made me believe even I could control the weather and make it rain

characters.name: Rocklee
characters.description: The most hard working ninja ever. All workouts to be done for atleast 1000 reps. I will never ever give up
